events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the size was wrong and unusable.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting to return the product for money back.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service agent who will assist you with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent order.
Could you please provide the order number and the product details you wish to return so I can assist you further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. It's the blue jacket size L, but I ordered M by mistake.
Thank you for the info. We can process a full refund upon receipt of the returned jacket. I will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid return label and look forward to sending it back.
We have received the returned jacket and successfully processed your refund. The amount should appear on your payment method soon.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund and if you need any further assistance.
Thank you for contacting customer support. We are closing this case as your refund has been completed and confirmed.
